extension.summary: ALT Wizard is a lightweight and fast build installer designed for Kodi 19+ Matrix and Nexus. Built and maintained by lilzenbca, it allows private and public builds to be installed, updated, and maintained easily.
extension.description: Kodi Wizard by lilzenbca for managing and installing custom builds. Inspired by several open-source wizards including OpenWizard and Simple 19.
extension.disclaimer: This add-on does not host or provide any content. It is a build manager and maintenance utility only.
